name: Cracks In Hell
description:
This game is a hero defense game, when you level up through the experience gained by killing monsters.
You can summon and upgrade randomly given heroes

Items can be obtained with a certain probability when defeating monsters, and can be equipped to the appropriate hero.

If a hero is killed by a monster, it can be resurrected after 45 seconds, and if the hero dies a total of 20 times, the hero will be defeated, so make sure that the hero does not die.

It consists of a total of 11 stages and can be cleared by defending 60 rounds of each stage.

A mighty army of 20 people!
You must train them to create a stronger army and defeat the final boss Demon.
